TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 定義選擇性合約，繫結可以實作此合約來指定服務要以同步還是非同步方式處理傳入要求。

span.span: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在某些情況下，讓繫結使用同步 或 方法來處理訊息可能會比較有效率。In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous or methods. 類別可以選擇性地實作 ，以便向呼叫端指示這是偏好的方式。A class can optionally implement to indicate to callers that this is preferred. 如果繫結未實作，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務模型執行階段層預設會使用的非同步版本`Receive`和`Request`方法。If a binding does not implement , the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods. 如果繫結會實作，WCF 服務模型執行階段層會檢查的值並使用它來判斷是否要呼叫的同步版本的這些方法 (或) 或非同步版本 (並或是和。If a binding does implement , the WCF Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods ( or ) or the asynchronous versions ( and or and . 如果 是由繫結所實作，並從 `true` 屬性傳回 ，則建議您使用同步 和 方法來從通道接收訊息。If is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous and methods to receive messages from the channel. 如果繫結並未實作 ，或是從 `false` 屬性傳回 ，則建議您使用非同步 和 或是 和 方法。If the binding does not implement or returns `false` from the property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous and or and methods. 不論 屬性傳回的值為何，所有的繫結都仍然必須針對實作的特定通道型別來提供同步和非同步 `Receive` 方法版本的有效實作。Regardless of the value returned by the property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented. 如需有關如何實作自訂通道的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 開發通道](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/developing-channels.md)。For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/developing-channels.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範實作 介面之繫結的實作方式。The following example shows the implementation of a binding that implements the interface. 此程式碼取自[區塊通道](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/chunking-channel.md)範例：This code is taken from the [Chunking Channel](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/chunking-channel.md) sample: [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChunkingChannel#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_chunkingchannel/cs/tcpchunkingbinding.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReceiveSynchronously As Boolean
public: property bool ReceiveSynchronously { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出以同步還是非同步方式處理傳入要求可以比較有效率。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.

value.span: 如果處理要求可以更有效率地以同步方式;否則。

span.span: if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise .

value.span: 預設為 ，這樣會以非同步方式處理要求。

span.span: The default is , to handle requests asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準 （系統提供） 繫結提供由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 已經實作這個介面，並在某些情況下覆寫預設值，以同步方式處理傳入訊息。The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChunkingChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_chunkingchannel/cs/tcpchunkingbinding.cs#1)]
